metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9840 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM 5.0.3 and prior allows low-privilege users to upload files of dangerous types, which can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
